mapper.select: select distinct eilr.enterprise_id from enterprise_industry_label_relation eilr inner join industry_label il on il.id = eilr.label_id inner join `industry_chain_node_label_relation` t3 on il.`id` = t3.`industry_label_id` inner join `industry_chain_node` t4 on t3.`chain_node_id` = t4.`id` and t4.chain_id = #{chain_id} and il.`deleted` = 0 and t3.`deleted` = 0 and eilr.`deleted` = 0
